job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtAbout OutletltstronggtltpgtltpgtOutlet provides the best cash accounts in America with a 6 APY  over 100x what traditional banks are paying This is made possible through the use of blockchain and all the advances the tech brings with it We are a high growth startup looking to change how banking is done and are looking for a team of badass techies to help us do itltpgtltpgtWe are hiringampnbspemployee 1ampnbspto help us take Outlet to the next level We are looking for a full stack React software engineer Since youll be employee 1 youll be a founding employee Youll be contributing ideas owning the development of new features analyzing data and putting out fires Youll also be influential in laying out the framework future engineers will follow As employee 1 youll need to be self sufficient and be able to work under pressure You understand lean methodologies and understand that we need to build quality features as quickly as possibleltpgtltpgtAll in all youll be working along side the founders from Ideation to feature development to help Outlet reach its full potentialltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtTech StackltstronggtltpgtltpgtOur Stack is all JS and Typescript based and consists of the followingltpgtltulgtltligtReact NativeltligtltligtReactltligtltligtNodeltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat we are looking forltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt4 years full stack experience building JS applications specifically using React or React NativeltligtltligtExperience implementing testsltligtltligtExperience working with AWS Lamda Functions or similar cloud function libraryltligtltligtSelfdrive to improve the product beyond specified requirementsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtBonus PointsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtHave experience implementing End to End tests on React NativeltligtltligtExperience with Microsoft App CenterltligtltligtFamiliar with the Ethereum development ecosystemltligtltligtIf you are ready to change banking wed love to hear from you At Outlet we are looking for people who are want to play a role in shaping the future of financeltligtltulgt
